review: This Fire TV box is the best, hands down.  So good, I own 2 of these and bought 2 more for my family.  Super fast performance with it's quad core processor and 2 GB of RAM.This Fire TV is way better than Google Chromecast or Roku, and also better than the smaller Fire TV stick.  It's roughly 2-3X the price of the smaller Fire TV stick, but the performance is a lot better and worth it in my opinion.  If you are an Amazon Prime customer, this box is perfect for you.  You'll have access to all the Amazon movies, TV shows, and music.  You can also view your photos that are uploaded to the Amazon Cloud.  If you're into games, there is a whole library of games to choose from, some are free, some are paid.This is an Android box so you can also side load apps without rooting it which is awesome.  There are lots of articles online on how to side load apps.We use this Fire TV box every day after we cut the cable tv cord.  We also use it a lot for viewing photos we take with our phones and uploaded to Amazon's cloud.  Highly recommend this box to anyone.  Best TV box on the market
